alert.note: Alert for Georgetown; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 3:52PM EDT until July 23 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Georgetown County in northeastern South Carolina... South central Williamsburg County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 352 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Jamestown, or 18 miles east of Moncks Corner, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Andrews, Lambert, Sampit, Trio, Warsaw and Earle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
